meanings.definition: A change or addition to a legal document or law.
meanings.sent1: The amendment to the contract clarified the payment terms.
meanings.sent2: The government passed an amendment to the constitution.
meanings.sent3: The amendment to the recipe made the cake taste even better.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like an amendment to the gloomy room, brightening everything up.
meanings.sent5: The amendment to the dress design transformed it into a stunning gown.

meanings.definition: The process of making changes or additions to a legal document or law.
meanings.sent1: The amendment of the policy required thorough discussion.
meanings.sent2: The amendment of the bylaws took several weeks to complete.
meanings.sent3: The amendment of the play script turned it into a comedy.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was the key amendment in achieving her goal.
meanings.sent5: The constant amendment of the schedule caused confusion among the team.
